thoughts.text: Now that we have gathered some information from the website, we can use the 'get_text_summary' command to get a summary of the relevant information. Additionally, we can use the 'write_to_file' command to save any interesting information that we found to a file.

By using the 'write_to_file' command to save any interesting information that we found to a file, we can easily access it in the future and ensure that we are using the most up-to-date information.

- Use the 'get_text_summary' command to get a summary of the relevant information
- Use the 'write_to_file' command to save any interesting information that we found to a file
